44951.name: Superior Rune of Exuberance
44951.description: Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: 3% of vitality is converted to healing power.
5% of vitality is converted to precision.
7% of vitality is converted to power.

44952.name: Major Rune of Exuberance
44952.description: Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: 2% of vitality is converted to healing power.
3% of vitality is converted to precision.

44953.name: Minor Rune of Exuberance
44953.description: Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: 1% of vitality is converted to healing power.

44954.name: Minor Rune of Tormenting
44954.description: Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

44955.name: Major Rune of Tormenting
44955.description: Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

44956.name: Superior Rune of Tormenting
44956.description: Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +20% torment duration; when you use a heal skill, apply two stacks of torment to nearby foes. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 20s)</c>

44957.name: Superior Rune of Perplexity
44957.description: Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: 25% chance when struck to inflict 3 stacks of confusion for 5 seconds. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 25 Seconds)</c>
+20% confusion duration; when you use a heal skill, inflict 3 stacks of confusion in an area for 6 seconds. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 15s)</c>

44958.name: Major Rune of Perplexity
44958.description: Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: 15% chance when struck to inflict 3 stacks of confusion for 5 seconds. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 25 Seconds)</c>

44959.name: Minor Rune of Perplexity
44959.description: Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

48907.name: Superior Rune of Antitoxin
48907.description: Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses:
-12% condition duration applied to you.
Gain 5 stacks of might for 10 seconds on incoming poison or torment (20s cooldown)

48911.name: Superior Sigil of Torment
48911.description: Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description:
50% chance on critical: Apply AoE torment (5 seconds, 180 radius).
(Cooldown: 5 Seconds)

74525.name: 20-Slot Equipment Pact Box
74525.description: 20 slots. If possible, weapons and armor will fill this box before other empty spaces. The contents of this box will not move when inventory is sorted. Items in this box will never appear in a sell-to-vendor list and will not move when inventory is sorted.
